name: Angry Earl Saves the Earth
description:
The year is 2046, and mankind has opened a portal to Hell.

As zombies and demon soldiers roam the streets, the prayers of the innocent can be heard throughout the long night...

"Save us Earl! Save us!"

Their prayers have been answered. Earl picks up his blaster, knowing he is the only person angry enough to defeat the demonic horde! Join Earl as he eliminates waves of evil in three exciting locations: a street, laboratory, and hellscape!

How to Play
Arrow Keys = Move
Spacebar = Shoot
Pickup health packs to restore health!

The game can be completed without killing anything, but it isn't recommended!
